Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” depicts his adolescence that were shared together with the famine intensifying around him, and “The Party” represents his young adulthood when he moved to Tokyo to pursue his dream in poetry writing against weakness caused by hunger.
